captions.text:
Since how many years
are you doing this research?
10 years.. - Okay..

Sir, when did you felt
like doing this kind of research?
See don't ask me silly questions.
I am not cinema hero, okay?

Do you still believe these
things in scientific times?
Don't you feel superstitious?

We have ignored many things
told by our forefathers..
..by calling them superstitious.

Why are we washing clothes?
Cleaning everything..

Why do make rounds around Basil tree?
There is a reason for all these.

Even the vermillion
that we apply on forehead..
..has a scientific reason.

But we think this
is the age of computers..

..and distancing ourselves from
them by calling them superstitious.

Sir, have you seen the
people effected by black magic?
I have seen many people.

But I cannot say with confirmation
that they are troubled it.

Ever did you get scared
after seeing something?

I never got scared by
seeing anything till now..
..but I am waiting for that day.
Oh my lord..
One of our friend Marshal P. Jose..
..has merged in you now.

I pray to lord for
resting his soul in peace.
Amen!

The brave person who
died today is your soldier..

Hope he takes birth again
and live a stable life.
Dear friends..
Our lord is kindhearted.
We need not regret our mistakes.
Let us ask him for forgiveness. Amen.

I was born after many
years of my parents marriage.
Normally children born late are..
.. pampered more by parents.

My mother died in a car
accident when I was small.

Father too went into
coma after few days.

My father and I never
used to talk much.
He, his room and piano were his world.
He used to scold all the time.
He would scold me more..

.. when I said I want to become
a write and publish many books.
But still he is a very good father.
A very good human being.
Have a wonderful journey, dad.
Dear friends, now we..
Marshal P. Jose who reached god..

..are gathered to
mourn his passing away.
His soul..

I have read it.
It is very complicated.

Our people..
no chance.. they don't like all these.
Try something new.

Write a good love story.
It will sell more.

Suppose your love story..
your friend's love story..
The incidents of call centre..
Bring some new things, sir.

Women like that.
I will tell you a short story.
One beautiful girl loves a boy.

That boy turns into
a vampire at night.
But still that girl loves that boy.

Sir, write on such
realistic incidents.
Public will like it.
Sir, novel is like a cinema.

Youth should like it..
women should adore it.
Then only we will get good money.
Try something new, sir.
This will not work. Never!

Ambience is very
important for a creator.

The place where we
are painting a picture..
It reflects in the painting itself.

For example. If we are
drawing a picture in graveyard..

..then our mind is
filled with silence.

It turns out to be
a beautiful painting.

Not only in painting, ambience
plays an important role in all arts.

So based on your choice select
good places and surroundings.

Okay. This is the painting
done by me yesterday.

What do you think by watching it?
- Did you loose the entire property?

Don't know.
Not confirmed. Case is still going on.

Do you know something?
My candidate bought a car. Audi.

Listen to me.
Arti, this is the right time.

There is no use in
believing him further.
I am really very sorry.

I couldn't attend
your father's funeral.

On an important case..
- It is okay. - It is okay, uncle.
Jebin..
Case's hearing is taking place.
But everything is in their favor.
Since your father is in coma..
Is he in coma for six months?

All these have turned
into their favor.

Jebin, mostly we should hand over this
house to them in the next hearing.

Uncle, it is because
of the debt I took.

Friends are there. I will
stay them with them for few days.
Jebin..
I want to tell you an important thing.
Tell me, uncle.

Of course I wouldn't have told
this matter if your father was there.

But I couldn't stop myself from tell
this matter to you in this situation.
Tell me, uncle.

There is a villa
in your name in Vizag.
In Vizag? - Yes.

In fact your father bought it in your
name immediately after your birth.

After your mother's death,
your father left from there.

Reason is not known. Ever did
you father tell you anytime about it?
No, uncle. He didn't tell me anything.

Veyr strange. Your father
tried a lot to sell that house.
There were many obstacles.

Don't know why,
he couldn't sell that house.
You can use it if you want.
Keys are in your father's locket.
Okay, don't get angry.

He didn't even tell
me there is a house.
What mistake did I commit?

I don't know there is
a house in my name until now.

Okay, leave it. There will be
a reason behind everything elders do.

Is it a big mistake if
I wish to become a writer?

I said clearly that I cannot
do anything and I am inefficient.
I started business because of him.
I faced losses.

I paid the loan by selling the house,
land and everything.
Now..
I have nothing, Arti. I am lost.
Come. Come. Come I say.

No, Arti..
I don't understand why he hates me.

Don't know if it is his curse..
my first book is not published yet.

Don't talk like that.
Things will fall in your place, Jebin.

Hey, it will take little time.
That's it.

We thought we had nothing till now.
Have you seen it?
There is a house in your name.
Why don't you think positively?

Yes.. that house
is the only option now.

I will have to think
what to do after selling it.
Is this called positive thinking?

What should I do? Nobody is
coming forward to publish my book.

.That's why I am thinking to
sell that house and publish it myself
Did you listen to anything I said?
First go and see how the house looks.
We will talk later.

I will go to Vizag tomorrow
and see that house.

Nobody looked after it
after father went into coma.
First I have to see it's condition.

And I thinking of writing
my second book there.
Do you know any house broker here?
My father knows.
Ask him and tell me.

And don't tell this matter
to our friends right now.

They will ask for
treat and everything..
..moreover the house is on beachside.

If you go to Bheemili
beach after crossing Vizag..

East facing building at the end
of Light House street is our villa.
This is the blueprint of that house.
Here it is a kind of art.

Next to it is a hall..
there is an extension to it.

And it's value will be around
four to four and half crores.
Jebin, I know a broker.
I suggest you meet him.
Distemper is more. Stainer is less
If it is not completed by evening..

Do you think I will not come
out if you complaint against me?
Come!
I will not spare you!

Why are you beating me like this?
- You are dead!
Listen to me! Leave me!
Don't beat me!

I will kill you!
- Why are you beating me?
Hold him! Hold him!

Hey, why are you fighting?
- Why do you want?

There are innumerable things between
brothers. You leave. Don't interfere.

So will you come to
the work place and fight?
Hey! You go and do your work.

Hey! I am telling you politely.
Leave from here.

Hey! What are you watching?
Take him away! - Come!

Hey, why are you looking around
when I am telling you to go and work.
Come. Come!

Hey! I will see for
how long you will escape.
You will die in my hands.

Useless people cannot
enjoy my father's property.
Really?

Arti, it is very beautiful.
It has an antique look.

And I forgot to tell you something.
You should come and see the wood work.

You will be amazed with
the wood works done here.
They have left the things too.
Wow! I want to see it immediately.
Should I start right now?
Not now. No need to hurry.

It is okay if you start
in leisure tomorrow morning.

And one more thing. There are
lot of paintings all over the house.
Paintings?

Sir, how can he come
to the work place and fight?
How can we work? Who will give work?
Did he beat you?

Sir, he came to beat. He would
have killed had it been little late.

Sir, who will take care
of my wife and children..
.. if some untoward incident happened?
Hey! Shut up!
Sir, you have to do something.

What do you want me to do?
You gave the complaint.
We brought him and kept him in remand.
He received the bail and left.
You should be careful.
Can we provide protection to everyone?

If you want then give one
petition to cancel his bail.
I will take care.
Okay, sir. Greetings.
Greetings, sir.
Bring it.. - Sir.. - What is it?
How long? - Wait.. wait, Arti.
Drive fast.
Is this the place?
Duality.
I undestood that painting.

I am unable to understand
what this painting is.
I too didn't understand.
Okay. Leave it. Did you look at that?

The girl is two faced. For
that they used the dark.. - Okay fine.

You see it in leisure.
I will wait in the balcony. - Okay.
Wow! I liked the house very much!
All rooms are superb.

Wherever we see,
it looks like Maniratnam's frames.

As you said,
entire wood work is too classy.

They are very artistic.
I am so excited. I am so happy.

Well, are these your
father's paintings?
I know my father paints but..

This range..
he never showed me anytime. - Jebin..

Will you sell this house filled with
so many good memories? Think over it.

I don't have any
attachment with the house.

But if I see all that in this
situation then nothing will work.

Selling is the only option.
- Hey! Why are you acting stubborn?
What should I do then?

I will tell you now.
Will you imagine as I say?
Your first book is published..
You received lot of money..
A big car.. bigger than Audi. Okay?

After that our marriage..
in this house.

There are not many
guests in the marriage.

But marriage will take
place in a grand manner.

I am walking from
there in wedding gown.

Tell me, Arti.
- Are you still sleeping?

You said something
about marriage yesterday.

Everything came in dreams.
- Okay listen.

Just now I received
a call from the publisher.
They liked the book that you wrote.

They are okay with the
percentage that you asked.

Hello? - Yes,
are you pinching yourself?

Okay. Start immediately
after pinching yourself.
I am starting right now.

Greetings, sir.
My name is Venkateshwar Rao. - Who?
I am a house broker.

I heard this house is for sale.
- Yes, I said it.

Sir, I have many parties with me.
Shall we go inside and talk?

I is little late.
Can we meet on saturday?
Sir, this is my visiting card.
Sir, contact this number on top.
There is some smell, right?

Sir, a small registration yesterday..
there was a party so..
Not that.. there is some other smell.
Yes, sir.

Okay leave it.
We will meet on saturday. - Okay, sir.

I read your book, sir.
I liked it very much.

Climax.. last 40 pages..
I didn't expect it.
Thank you, sir.

The way you used the characters..
the detailing..

The words you used..
I liked everything a lot.
I am thinking to publish this book.
Thanks a lot, sir.

Sir, why are you still typing
your manuscript in typewriter?

There so no special reason.
Just a small sentiment.

Oh I see. By the way, are you
planning another book? - Yes, sir.

Recently I shifted to our new
house in Vizag. I am writing it there.
Oh. Sequel to this?

No, sir.
It is totally a different story.
Oh nice. So then..
If you don't mind..

..will you give the publishing
rights of that book too for us?
Sure, sir.

Then shall I make
agreement for both novels?
Yes. Say okay. - Okay, sir.
Keep this 5 lakhs as advance.

I already told you.
Did you listen to me?

You said you will sell the house.
Now see.
Five lakhs after going to that house.

Whatever it is,
you have set your eyes on that house.
Hey.. - What happened?
I forgot. - What?

We thought we will
tell our love matter..

..to my father when your
first book's contract gets done.
Did you forget?

It is just 15 minutes that
a good thing happened in my life.

Will you not allow me
to enjoy it for some time?

Whatever you say, I will talk
to my father about our love matter.
Wish me good luck.
Good luck. Yes!

Sir, there is some
smell coming from inside.

I cannot tolerate it.
It is throwing up.
It is coming from your house.

We wanted to see what
it is but the gate was locked.
Open the lock fast. Open it.

I think it is not here.
Shall we go there and see?
Sir, it is here.

I think it is some stray dog.
- No, sir.

Did you leave the
gate open last night?
No, sir. It was locked.
Maybe it jumped the wall and entered.

Okay. Shall I call the municipality
and tell them to clear it?
Yes, Arti.
Hey.. Arti.. what happened?
My dad.. dad..
Tell me. What happened to father?
Dad said okay.
Oh.. why are you crying for that?
I don't know. I feel like crying.
What is that reaction?
No, Arti. Two happiness in one day.
Happiest day in my life.
Lucky house. Please don't sell it.
Everything is happening as we wanted.
Let's see.

So when are you coming?
- Weekend only.

Until then you concentrate
in writing your second book. Okay?
Okay. Bye. Love you.
Which key is it?
Is it spare key for some key?
No..

East facing second
house is our bungalow.
This is its blueprint.
It is a kind of art.

After that..
there is an extension from there.

If you go straight, you will
find staircase to first floor.
I am here..

Arti.. start immediately tomorrow
and come home. - Why? What happened?

I will tell you.
You come immediately. First you start.

Oh! Why are you getting
confused unnecessarily.

That's why they say not to love
boys who write crime story novels.
Be serious, Arti.

Why should father
hide these paintings?

Why do you take tension
on such a small thing?
Now listen..
Our professor said..
All painters while painting..
..have different mindsets.

After some time when
they see that painting..

..they think of the mindset
they had while making that painting..

..they will hang them in halls
like this or hide in store rooms.
It is all about their mindset, Jebin.

There is something in
each painting hung there.

Don't know why but I am afraid
from the time I saw the paintings.
How many such paintings are there?
There are many paintings in the room.

Where is that room?
I have to see it immediately.
Sir! Jebin sir!
Are you free?

It is nothing, sir.
One NRI party saw our villa..

.. and liked it very
much and they talked about it.

Sir, if you say okay then
I will bring it immediately.
One minute.
Come here.

Arti is ready. If you say okay
then I will bring it immediately.
Sorry, sir.

We are unable to take
any decision in this condition.
Give us some time. I will inform you.

No, madam.
It is a big party. Single payment.
We need not run behind anyone.
Oh! No, sir. It is not possible now.

If we wish to sell then we
will definitely inform you. - Okay.

Okay, madam. Contact only me.
Yes, sure. - Don't meet others.,
No! No! No!

Sir knows me very well.
Bye, madam. - Bye.

Madam, they are asking
for movie shootings too.
Will you ask sir and tell me.

Okay, we will see.
I will ask him and tell you.
Okay, madam. Bye.
I have to see that room.
Are these all paintings?
Yes.
Hey, see this.
Anybody in car accident..
I think my mother's car accident..

Sorry. Maybe it is painted
after the accident took place.
Painting was made in 1983.
My mother died in 1985. - Okay.
What is this? Someone in hospital..
Don't know..
Hey! Did you see this?

It looks someone
is taking award, right?
Did you receive any award? - No.

Think properly. Did you
receive any award in childhood?
No.
Let's drop this here.

It is waste of time to
think of this and get frightened.
Just forget it, Jebin.
One of the painting was co-incidence.
Will every painting happen the same?
You already faced many troubles..

..because of your father
and your profession.

Why do you take all
the problems on your head?
I felt like telling someone.
I am feeling a lot better now.
Your father about our marriage..
One minute.
Hello. Tell me.
Yes.

This year the special
jury award sponsored by..

..Blackbird Literacy circle goes to
the author of book 'Maybe may not be.'
..Mr. Jebin M. Jose.

Thousands of copies of
this book have been sold..
..within thee days of its release.

I wish to inform you that this is Mr.
Jebin's first book.
Please come.
Arti, I don't want this house.
Greetings, sir. Greetings.
Come. Come. - Greetings.
Greetings, madam. - Greetings. - Come.
Come inside. Come, sir.

Madam, it leads to backward
from there. We can go from here too.
Here is an attached western toilet.

Room is built with teakwood.
This is main entrance.

There is another entrance
next to the window over there.

Madam, I showed all the rooms of
ground floor. I will show you upstairs.
Okay. - Come.

Sir, see them.
Staircase is made of teakwood.
Art of olden days. It is intact.
Okay.
Sorry, Arti.

Hope you are not angry
for selling this house.

What is this?
Why do you say like that?
I am not angry at all.
Is there a way leading to upstairs.

We can go upstairs, sir.
There is staircase.
How old is it?
This is store room.

Sir, what is your son studying?
- 4th standard. - Okay.

Sir, there is international boarding
school nearby. You can join him there.
Super school, sir.

Is everything made of teak?
- Yes, sir. Burma teak.
This one too? - Yes, sir.

Lights seem to be old. - No, sir.
There is low voltage. House is superb.

You don't get plot for
the price you quoted. - No.
We are giving it with building.

You are quoting very high.
- Sir, your rate will not work.
Quote another price. - See..

Everything is okay.
We will keep it on friday.
Thank you, sir. - Thanks.

Sir, he said we will
do the registration on friday.
Okay. Should I bring something?
Yes, sir. Four passport size photos..

Also ration card or
voter id for address proof.

Sir, care of document
is very important.
And.. document should be original.

Sir, if anything else is needed,
I will call and tell you.
Sir, it seems to rain. I will leave.

Sir, come at 10 o'clock
in the morning.

Though it is late,
we found a nice party. Bye, sir.
What happened?
Venkateshwar Rao!

What happened to you?
- My hand is injured.
Gate hit me! - How?

Nothing will happen.
Let us go to hospital.
Nothing will happen to you.
Bear for sometime.

Nothing will happen.
Bear for sometime. - Sir..
How is he now?
Multiple fracture.
Bones got crushed.

The people who came to buy the house
are afraid now after this incident.
They are thinking it is some ill-omen.

I can't live with
these thoughts, Arti.
I feel like dying.
Don't take any tension.
If you want then I will stay with you.
Arti, I don't want to stay here.

Had my father burnt them before
then I wouldn't have seen them.

I cannot live in peace as
long as these paintings are here.

I am gonna burn them all.
- Jebin! Stop, Jebin! Please, Jebin.

Don't act in haste.
Stop, Jebin. Don't get angry.
Hey! Hey, wait a minute!
Jebin! Hey! Hey!
Hey!
Arti!
Why did you switch off the mobile?
Arti was calling me.

You should have told
her that you are coming here.

Did you take the call?
What did she say?

No, I didn't take her call.
What happened? Any fight between you?

Hey, Arti is calling.
Talk to her at least now.
Talk. - No.
You tell her something and manage.

What should I tell her?
This is not fair.
Hello. Yes, tell me, Arti.
No. He is here.
You don't take any tension.

Mobile got switched
off due to low battery.

I will take care of him.
You don't worry. Okay?
Bye. Good night.
Don't talk rubbish!

Let us assume that everything
portrayed in paintings has happened.

So how can you confirm
that it is you in the paintings?

Pratap, don't talk
without knowing the matter.

Oh! Think that you
didn't go to that house.
How will all these happen?
My father too thought the same.
He hid that there is one such house.
But that house made me to come.

As depicted in the paintings
I became a writer. I took awards.

Everything is happening.
Is all this a co-incidence?

Fear inside me increased
after broker met with accident.

When I asked lawyer uncle
he said that father went..

.. to the extent of
bringing down the house.
It troubled so much.

But he couldn't do
anything to that house.
By watching all these happenings..

..it is our mistake
to consider it co-incidence.

I think there is some problem in
the house rather than the paintings.
Did your father have any enemy?
He didn't have any enemy. Why?
I think this could be their work.

Your father facing losses
in business.. his death in coma..

They call it blackmagic..
it could be that too.
You went to that house, right?

Did you find anything made
of aluminum or some strange object?

You would talk about science.
Why are you talking of blackmagic?

Hey! Jebin!
There is more science behind it.

Okay. Do you know who
lived in that house before?
No, I don't know.

Okay. We should find out
who lived in that house before.

If something weird like
this happened to them..

..then we will find a big
source to find out this matter.

It was in the name of
one Bheemeshwar Rao's wife.
Your father purchased that house..
..from them in 1982.
But before that..

..we don't know to whom
that house belonged to.

Bheemeshwar Rao had
a son by name Pothuraju.

If you meet him then
you can get some details.
If you want Pothuraju's address..
Sir, a person by name Pothuraju..
It is me, sir.
Come, sir. Come. Come, sir.
Sit down, sir.
Tell me, sir.
We are renovating our house.
Ammulu! - Yes. - Make tea.
No, I don't want. - It is okay, sir.
We asked many people outside.
They said you do it very well.

You don't worry, sir.
Work will be neat.
Sir, our house is in Vizag.

It will be long for you.
Hope it is fine for you.
Vizag only..
My native too is Vizag.

I know all the areas
over there very well.

We finished one house
in Vizag two months back.

Which area do you
belong to in Vizag, sir?
Near Bheemili beach, sir.
Oh! My house too is there.
There is a building at east facing.
Next to light house.

There is a villa at the street corner.
We bought it.
Pandu..
Go out and play for sometime.
No, father..
Go I say.
No, sir.
Not that house, sir.
Why, sir? Why are you saying no?

That was our house, sir.
We sold it to a big businessman.
He is a Christian.
Oh! Is that your house?
You don't know, sir.

My father faced continuous
problems after buying that house.
My father is a big landlord, sir.

That house came under
auction so he bought it.

He faced losses in
business after buying it.
He became mad due to that.
He died in the bed of that hall.
Oh!
I was born to my father's second wife.

He came from this first
wife and stayed with us..
..during his last days.

Situation became worse
after my father's death.

We thought we should
sell that house somehow.
We sold it at normal price.
I am my mother came and settled here.

We thought we got rid
of the ill-omen with it..
..the son of his wife's wife came..

..and asks for the share from the
money obtained from selling the house.
He comes and fights sometimes.
Not only that..

..he even tried to
kill me couple of times.
Now he is in jail.
Please listen to me, sir.
You seem to be a good person.

You don't face the problems
that I faced because of that house.
Leave it, sir.
Jebin..
Bye.
Wait, sir. Have tea and go.

No, I will definitely
drink when I come next time.
Thanks a lot.
Okay, sir. - Bye.
Greetings. - Greetings.
Who? Arti?
For how long will you avoid her?
Poor girl! Go and talk to her.

I will see that.
First we will think of this.
Maybe his first wife or..

..her son must have
done something to the house.
Maybe it is true. But what I feel is..

..we should find out who stayed
there in that house before that.
If we could find it out..

..then we can solve
this problem very easily.
How can we find that?

I will go and inquire
in registrar office.
I will inquire Pothuraju's brother.
Look, leave all this to me.
You go and convince Arti.

Leave it.
I cannot sleep until I find it out.

Hey, don't talk like a fool.
She too must have got scared like you.

Go. What is the problem
in going and talking?

It has been five days since
you talked to me properly.
Arti, please try to understand.

You know what all
is happening in my life.
I know.

Not talking to me
is the solution for this?
I don't know.

Okay, leave it. What is happening?
Did you get any clue?
No.

See, Jebin.
I didn't come to fight with you.

I think our relationship shouldn't
get disturbed because of this issue.
My dad is asking when our marriage is.
Stop it, Arti. Do you find it funny?
I told you..

..I cannot live in peace
until I sort this matter.

You are getting
confused unnecessarily.

We can sell that house
and live in peace in Vizag only.
You are hanging onto that house.
Anything else, madam?
No thanks. - Okay. Thank you.

What should I answer
my dad if he asks me?

Will you ignore me suddenly after
being in relationship for so long?
Hey, why are you talking more.
This is my problem.
You have got nothing to do with it.

What if I die in real
as depicted in that painting?
Will you cry for a week?

Will you cry for two weeks?
After that..

..you will marry the boy
chosen by your father and leave.
Go and marry.
Hello.
Yes, Jebin. Where are you?
Nearby.. coffee shop.
What happened? - Nothing..
We will talk directly, okay?
I am in the house. You come.
Yes, I am coming there.
Okay. Bye.
I have to go. We will meet later.

Before the government
took over that house..

..I came to know something
about the owner of that house.

That house was built
by a French psychic called..
Yes.. Jack Neesemen.
He believed blackmagic is true..

..and conducted many
experiments to know the future.
While finding details about him..

He was arrested for killing
a one year old baby in 1930's.

What we call human
sacrifice in our village..

He did something like
that and got caught.

After that there was no
information on internet after that.
What about the house after that?
Government occupied that house..

.. after independence
and has put it for auction.

Mr. Bheemeshwar Rao bought
it in that auction. Yes.

When I searched about
the Nostradamus incidents..
..happening to you..

..I saw a block.
Come, I will show you.

This is that block.
His name is Devenesan.

He knows telugu.
For the past ten years..

..he is doing research
on negative energy and future.
As a result of this research..
..he found that negative energy..
..has sufficient power to..
..predict the future.

Somehow I think there is some
connection between his prediction..

..and the things that
are happening to us.

There is a chance that we
will get to know more details..
..if we go and meet him directly.
What do you say, Jebin?

He tried to predict
future through blackmagic.

You said everything in your life is
happening as shown in the paintings.
Yes, sir.

How many incidents must
have happened like that?

Sir, around four to five
incidents happened like that..

They didn't happen by
co-incidence or naturally.

Did the pet raised
by you behaved strangely.
Or did he die? After you went there..
I didn't raise any pets, sir.
But one dog died few days back.
This is a very strange case.
Going by the studies I did till now..
..and by the inputs given by you..
..the reason for all this is..
..that Frenchman's..
..witchcraft.
I didn't understand, sir.
For every action there is a reaction.
Like positive and negative..
..ends of a battery.
Electricity.. magnet..

For everything there
is positive and negative.

Sir, please tell in
a way that I understand.
You are going to a temple.
Temple, mosque, church..
It could be anything.
We go there and worship god.
We make rounds.

After that we sit
there for half an hour.
How do we feel from inside then?
We feel peaceful and happy.
We don't think whom to kill or..
..how to loot.
Mind keeps the bad things away..
..and think of good things.

You know the sanctorums
in the temples of our country..
..are made of metal alloys..
..like magnet.

They believe positive
energy is produced with it.
Our hair..

..has the energy to absorb
positive energy? Do you know that?

That's why they tell men to remove
shirt and before entering temples.

They tell them to
worship by lifting hands.
Hair under armpit and on chest..
..will absorb positive energy.

That is the reason why women are told
to come by wearing heavy jewellery.

Because gold has the capacity
to absorb positive energy.
The dome of the temple..

..coated with gold.
That is the reason for it.
Sir, JJ Thompson effect?
But he invented in..
..the year 1969.

We have been following
these since many years.
So because of positive energy..
..only good things have happened.
Now just think opposite once.
Bad deeds.. seeking vengeance..
To induce such negative energy..

..many people have
followed many procedures.
According to western language..
Blackmagic, witchcraft, etc.,
In our village..
..it is called sorcery, voodoo..
..and many such things.
There is only one base for all this.
Negative energy.
In your case..

..the French psychic
who built your house..

..the negative energy formed
by the witchcraft he used.
It has spread all over the house.
So the inhabitants of that house..

..it made them to
think of future and..
..it came out in some art form.

Sir, can't we destroy
that negative energy?

No.. no..
energy can neither be created..
..not destroyed.

I don't say that we
can destroy it completely.
See..

..we do whitewashing to the
house when we went to live newly..

..in a house that was
inhabited by others before.
We carry out Lord Ganpati's prayers.
Why?

To neutralise the negative
energy present there.
We..
..shall we if we can..
..neutralise using sound
One more important thing.
The people who lived in that house..

..has the chance of knowing
happenings of future too.
Sir, he is writing a book.
Anything from that..- Hey.. no..

There is no connection between them.
It is about a filmmaker.
Okay. Anyway..
Check if Pothuraju's father..

..said something through
any of the art forms like..
..diary, notes, painting..
It could be about you too.

Did your father had
the habit of writing diary?
Or paintings, drawings, something..

Sir, I don't understand
what you are saying.
Sir, I am stuck in a big problem.
Think well and tell me.

Writing..
drawing.. something like that..

Sir, I don't understand
why you are asking all this?

Sir, it is not that..
- Pothuraju sir..

Try to understand us.
We are in a big problem.
His father bought your house.
Understand our situation..
..and help us.
Is it?
Yes, sir. He used to..

..write poems in telugu.
We had thrown them.
But my mother kept two, three books..
..as his memory.
Can you show those books?
Sir, I don't know whey they are now.

But there is one trunk box.
Let us see if they are in it - Okay.

Sir, I kept everything here because
there is no space in the house.
Come, sir.
Don't know where it is.
There is no time to clean all this.
Entire time is being spent in working.
Sir, he is..
..my father. Landlord.
Oh..

Sir, I didn't study much.
He is well educated.
This is the box.
See if it is in this.
Hold this photo.
Dear!
What? Wait, I am coming.
What is written in it?
A poet's destiny..

..weaves into a poem
with pictorial energy.

Unanswerable pictures
become questions..
Death before losing sanity..
Did you find something?

What? - It is not
written about me in it.

But.. Unanswerable
pictures become questions..
Death before losing sanity..
It is about my father's death in coma.
Time comes to an end..
Love has to..
..be sacrificed..
Family cannot escape..
..the gruesome death of a brother..
..in the hands of another brother.
Gruesome death.
Family..
Family..
Porthuraju..

It is written that his brother
will commit murder in the family.
Hey, what are you saying?
Nothing else..

I said I will buy ice-cream for you.
Why are you troubling, mother?

Wait, sir.
Eat and go. Food is being prepared.
Did you find anything, sir?
Pothuraju.. Jebin..
No, Pothuraju..

Leave it, sir.
Everything will be fine.
God is watching everything, sir.

Pothuraju,
take your family and go somewhere.
Don't stay here.
Please listen to me.
I am sorry if I had troubled you.
Close the doors.

Golden plates reflects
negative energy.

This water is exposed
to sunlight for long time.
it is called deuterium.

It has the power to
absorb the negative energy.
This instrument..
..is a tuning fork.
With the frequency emitted by it..
..it can neutralise negative energy.

The souls of the
inhabitants of this house..
..their memories are together.
They are now coming out now..

..because of disturbing
the negative energy.
This is strange.
Relationships will get shattered.
Love and affection will be lost.
One day both families..
..cannot escape siblings..
..gruesome death.
Jebin..
Jebin..
Sir..
Hey, dear..
Why are you crying?
Why do you want this?
I will play beautiful song for you.
For my darling.. Jebin!
Jebin..
What is it happening?
I already warned you my son.
Now it is too late.
You can change nothing.
Not only now..
Never..
You cannot change anything.
Ask him to stop.
Evil powers are more than I thought.

Sir, your neutralisation experiment
will not work. Ask him to stop.

It is better we leave from here.
- Don't be stupid.
Come, let us go.
No.. I will not come anywhere.
I want an answer.
What mistake did I commit?
Ask him to stop.
Why should I die?

I told you don't..
- Father, I didn't cheat anyone.

All the people who
died here are not bad.
All the people who die are not good.

There is no differentiation
between good and bad people here.
Destiny.
I didn't understand.
Ask him to stop. - Not possible.
Ask him to stop.
Not possible!
It is a long answer!
Jebin..
Let us go.. - Come..
Let us go.
Stop!
Come!
Pratap! Pratap!
Pratap! Get up!
Pratap!
Excuse me.
Where are the members of this house..

His friend got injured so they
took him to the hospital just now..
Which hospital?
Apollo. - Thank you.
I am sorry, Jebin.
I used you for my research selfishly..
I caused trouble to you.

I never expected it
will happen like this.
I never heard or studied it anywhere.
Jebin..

I think whatever is shown in
the paintings will definitely happen.
So becareful.
Oh..
How is he now?
Okay.

Sir, doctor is telling
you to come urgently.
I am really sorry to say this..
All his veins inside the knees..
..are totally cut.
We have to amputate both legs.
You know we tried our best.
Arti..
Jebin..
Sorry..
This happened to you because of me.
Jebin..
Is it paining severely?
No, Jebin..
I couldn't feel anything.
Below the abdomen..
Everything has become numb.
Arti came.
Take her somewhere, Jebin.
We don't want this house.
Please you both..
..go somewhere.
Please go somewhere.
Henceforth nothing shown in that..

..painting should happen.
It shouldn't happen.
Listen to me and you both..
..go somewhere.

Trying very hard to
extinguish the flames..

In a property dispute
in Amalapuram..- Jebin..
..a person by name Pothuraju..

..and his family were brutally
killed by his elder brother..

This incident has frightened
the people living in that area.
Pratap, what did you tell him?
Pothuraju's friend talked about it..
He tried to kill twice earlier..

Sir, after complaining the police..
and last night..
..this happened..
Police department has formed special..
..team to search for the accused.
In various places of the state..

Celebrations of goddess..
- I came and talked to him..
I told him to go somewhere with her..
He left in anger.
Go and talk, Arti. Go.

Oh! There is a similar
painting over there.
Are these still taking place?
Arti.. you go and stop him..
Stop him before..
..he takes some wrong decision.
You cannot change anything.
Not just now..
Not anytime..
I will not let you win!
I will not let you win!
You killed one person!
You killed one family!
I will not let you win this time!
I will not let you win!
I will not let you win!
I will not let you win!
These are the paintings?
Yes.

Arti doesn't know.
I hid some paintings.

There is one painting that
shows we are getting married..
..and I am killing her.
Why should I kill her?
She stood by me when I had nothing.

If she faces such
situation because of me..
..I don't mind if I die instead of it.
I will not let you win!
If I stay alive..
..then only I will marry her..
I will kill her myself..
And then I will burn this house.
I will die before that.
Your chapter closed!
Madam! Madam! House is gutted.
Madam, somebody is there inside.

Madam, we have to
call the fire service.
Give phone if you have. Madam!
I don't have phone.
Go and call from PCO.
Yes.
I think this will not work.
Leave it.

Listen to me.
This is the correct time, Arti.
There is no benefit in believing him.

There is nothing wrong
in waiting for sometime.
Case is going on.
If the judgement is in his favor..
You thought you had nothing.
Now see there is a house in your name.
Five lakhs after going to that house..

Whatever it is,
you have set your eyes on that house.

I don't want this house.
We will sell it.
Hey! Why are you acting stubborn?
Anyway he wants to sell the house.
See how much he gets on it.

How much you will get
if this house is sold?
Around four and half crores.
Four and half crores.. So..
..tell him to sell it quickly.
You can start your own business here.
But will he give that money to you.
I know how to take that money.
He is a dummy.
Twin tower attacks to be expected..
But it is happening correctly..

It is surprising
as well as frightening.
It is better if you remain careful.
This could be evil force too.
You don't go to that house..

..and better if you don't
meet the people related to it.

We can sell that house
and live in Vizag in peace.
You are hanging onto that house.
Why should I kill her?

If she faces such
situation because of me..

..then it is okay
if I die instead of her.
Idiot!

Sir, this is the house
that I talked about.

Sir, this is the only house
that is gutted and next to the city.
I thought this suits our story so..
Yes. - Courier.
Sign please. - Okay.

Sir, when I asked the people
around they said the owner of this..

..house set himself ablaze and
died after setting the house ablaze.
Since then nobody bothered this house.

But there is no problem, sir.
We can take permission.

If you see it once and confirm
it then we can start shooting.
House is very nice.
How could he set this house on fire?
Don't know what problem he had.

My hearty wishes
for your wedding, Arti.
I am very happy.

I never imagined that you will change
your mind so soon and get married.
Jebin kept his belongings in my room.
And then I found his second book.

Sir, only these paintings
were not burnt in this house.

By looking at it, it looks
as if someone is getting married
Sir, see this once.

Doesn't it look like
someone is killing.

Sir, it seems there
is some story in it.

I gave this book to the people

Pratap.
